package.name: XML_CSSML
package.summary: The PEAR::XML_CSSML package provides methods for creating cascading style sheets (CSS) from an XML standard called CSSML.

release.notes: This is the initial independent release of the XML_CSSML package. It includes support for both the domxml_xslt functions and the sablotron xslt extension. The main file includes a factory function, which calls the relevant container object depending on the extension the user wishes to use. It can either create an output css file or it can return the string. It has support for browser specific styles using the codes of Net_UserAgent_Detect as well as a filter to extract only applicable styles. There is an example file in the docs/ to better understand the usage.
